name: Ledger Investing
headline: Marketplace for insurance securitization.
description:
Ledger Investing provides an exciting opportunity for asset managers, pension funds, hedge funds, family offices and other institutions interested in earning a great return through insurance investing.

The company deploys proprietary software and data analytics covering many types of insurance risk portfolios. The technology enables insurers to securitize risk more efficiently while providing investors, asset managers, pension funds, hedge funds, family offices, and other institutions an opportunity to invest in a new and growing asset class.

Ledger Investing was founded by Julien Brissonneau, Aymeric Rabot and Samir Shah in 2016.

generated_description:
Ledger Investing is carving out a unique niche in the world of finance, focusing on insurance securitization. Think of them as a marketplace where serious capital meets innovative risk management. Founded in 2016 by Julien Brissonneau, Aymeric Rabot, and Samir Shah—who cut their teeth in Y Combinator’s Batch W17—this New York-based firm is on a mission to create a robust ecosystem for insurance-linked securities (ILS).

What does that mean? For asset managers, pension funds, hedge funds, and family offices, it’s about tapping into an asset class that’s gaining traction. Ledger provides these investors with the tools and insights to deploy their capital strategically within various types of insurance risk portfolios. Their proprietary software and data analytics streamline the process, allowing insurers to securitize risks more effectively. This efficiency creates compelling investment opportunities.

Ledger is not shy about their growth. They've securitized over $2 billion in premiums and secured more than $400 million in capital. Their partnerships include some of the largest managing general agents (MGAs) in the U.S., showcasing their prominence in the field.

The company has developed an impressive suite of products. This includes Connect, which lays the groundwork for risk data infrastructure; an analytics suite for modeling; and a monitoring system that provides real-time alerts and reports.
